groups.name: Banner
groups.description: Styles for the page Banner layout.

sections.name: Sidebar
sections.description: Styles for the Blog app sidebar.

fields.name: blogSidebarSecondaryColor
fields.label: Accent color
fields.description: Used for post count and dates.

groups.name: Body
groups.description: Styles for the body of the site.

fields.name: bodyBackground
fields.label: Body background
fields.description: The background outside the main content.

fields.name: contentBackground
fields.label: Content background
fields.description: The background of the main content.

fields.name: containerWidth
fields.label: Container width
fields.description: The maximum width of main content.

groups.name: Buttons
groups.description: Styles for buttons throughout the site.

groups.name: Columned Content
groups.description: Styles for the Columned Content block.

groups.name: Content Grid
groups.description: Styles for the Content Grid block.

groups.name: Featured Content
groups.description: Styles for the Featured Content Wrapper block.

groups.name: Image Grid
groups.description: Styles for the Image Grid block.

groups.name: Image Slider
groups.description: Styles for the Image Slider block.

fields.name: imageSliderBackgroundHover
fields.label: Background color (only applies to hover content)

fields.name: imageSliderColorHover
fields.label: Text color (only applies to hover content)

groups.name: Main Navigation
groups.description: Styles for the main navigation in the header.

groups.name: Menu Button (Small Screens)
groups.description: Styles for the small screen main navigation button.

groups.name: Notification Bar
groups.description: Styles for the notification bar above the header. Editable under Widgets → Collections → Notification Bar.

groups.name: Pagination
groups.description: Styles for the pagination at the bottom of app pages like Blog Home.

groups.name: Sidebar Navigation
groups.description: Styles for the sidebar navigation used in two-column page templates.

sections.name: Parent
sections.description: Styles for the current page's parent link.

groups.name: Skip to Main Button
groups.description: Styles for the "Skip to Main" button when using a keyboard to navigate the site.

groups.name: Top Bar
groups.description: Styles for the bar above the header.

groups.name: Typography
groups.description: Core typography styles for the site.

fields.name: headingUnderlineColor
fields.label: Underline color
fields.description: Can be applied to headings in the rich text editor under Block → Heading Centered Underline.
